post_content: T206 WaJo Port.  Piedmont 150.  Raw, clean front, obvious scrap book damage back.  (Sold)

Hey Ed,
Does it measure?  It looks a hair short but maybe not.

Thanks,
Chris

[quote name="Edwolf1963" post=2233577]T206 WaJo Port.  Piedmont 150.  Raw, clean front, obvious scrap book damage back.   $1700 PP/FF.[/QUOTE]

Hi Chris, yeah – it measures up, I don’t see any evidence of trimming. Purchased it raw, thought it may have been glue on the back because some of the back shows through but it is paper loss. Other than that it’s a clean, attractive card (IMO). I was going to send it in for grading but then again it’s not going to get better than 1/1.5 given the paper loss so it’s almost pointless.  If it helps, I’m attaching a picture here where I overlay this against another card in a holder to give a comparison

Does it measure?  It looks a hair short but maybe not.
